title: Report does anything at all and why so many people still underestimating it?
body:
This probably an old school subject but I'll bring it back anyway.
So you guys already notice, there are still many people do not care at all  about the tribunal system and they even told me that it doesn't work anyway. I am very confuse and angry at the same time.
How are these players still playing League and I don't really see any thing that tribunal did?
{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Tribunal isn't being implemented yet as it is still in development. The tribunal system has worked and has been proven from the sources of the tips that we read as players :>. Also if you were from the american server before OCE server was created during season 2 you may have used the tribunal system as I did and it was very informative and useful. 

The company has placed new ranked restrictions over the months but I would still report players in your games that are giving others a hard time and overall give evidence to your report as well. :>

GG, Trash you're getting 9 reports

gg ban.

JustTrash: WOAH, look at all the %%%%s i give! 

%%%%%%:  You'll give a %%%% when you get banned

JustTrash: We don't even have Tribunal in OCE you dumb ****

*Yeah, i was really pissed at this point*
